org.gvsig.raster.lib.buffer.api.statistics

Interface StatisticsCapable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observable, WeakReferencingObservable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Buffer, RasterSet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBuffer, ClippedBuffer, ConvertedTypeBuffer, DefaultBuffer, DefaultRasterSet

    public interface StatisticsCapable
extends WeakReferencingObservable
    This interface must be implemented by those classes which can provide statistics.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Statistics getStatistics(SimpleTaskStatus status)
      Gets the statistics of the object than implements this interface

        addObserver, deleteObserver, deleteObservers
